ingredients.ingredient: 1 large clove garlic, peeled and crushed
2 tablespoons chopped fresh rosemary, or more to taste
2 tablespoons chopped fresh thyme, or more to taste
4 Idaho potatoes, each cut into 8 wedges
freshly ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Pre-cook potato wedges in boiling water for 5-8 minutes before grilling to ensure doneness
Thread wedges onto skewers to prevent them from falling through grill grates
Use fresh herbs infused in oil for maximum aromatic flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you infuse the herbed oil flavor throughout the potato wedges?
